name: The 4th Asia-Pacific Conference on Management and Business
content: Dear Sir/Madam Greeting from The 4th Asia-Pacific Conference on Management and Business (2016 APCMB) Please add the following information on your webpage for advertisement of conference. Name of conference: The 4th Asia-Pacific Conference on Management and Business (2016 APCMB) Date(s) of conference: May 24-26, 2016 Full location details: Beijing, China Key dates (registration, abstract submission etc): Abstract Submission Deadline: February 15, 2016 Notification of Acceptance/ Rejection: March 05, 2016 Full Paper Submission Deadline: March 25, 2016 Registration Deadline: March 25, 2016 Website link: http://apcmb.org/ Contact details: apcmb@apcmb.org Organized by Higher Education Forum 12-1F.,No.129,Sec.1,Fuxing S.Rd.,Taipei,Taiwan http://www.prohef.org/ Tel:+886 2 2740 1498 Fax:+886 2 2752 2642 Courtyard By The Presidential Hotel Beijing 9 Fuchengmenwai Road, Xicheng District, Beijing, China Tel:+(86) 10 5858 5588 https://www.choicehotels.com/china/beijing/comfort-suites-hotels/cp010
